name: Coremind
description: CoreMind (CORE) is the utility token powering the MindCAP Protocol, a decentralized ecosystem designed to merge human consciousness with AI-driven intelligence. At its core are Neuroshards—personalized, evolving AI agents acting as cognitive extensions, digital twins, and verifiable proof of knowledge. CORE fuels Neuroshard creation, upgrades, and governance while enabling Holo NFTs for decentralized identity and reputation. Built on Ethereum, CoreMind focuses on privacy, autonomy, and scalable AI integration to create a new decentralized knowledge economy and empower humanity’s evolution.
